title: As the Premier League prepares for VAR vote , what is the view elsewhere ?
body_text:
Which Aqueous Solution Will Have The Lowest Freezing Point
The freezing point of an aqueous solution a solution where water is the solvent is influenced by the concentration of solute dissolved in it The solution with the lowest freezing point is the one with the highest concentration of solute particles in the water This colligative property known as freez
